title: It's All About Wine at The Dolder Grand, Zurich
text:
It's All About Wine at The Dolder Grand, Zurich It's All About Wine at The Dolder Grand, Zurich Details Category: Switzerland   14:30 Luxury Zurich resort, The Dolder Grand, has launched it's first exclusive All About Wine package, dedicated to discovering the alluring world of Swiss Wine. Bottled into two days, the offering leads budding wine connoisseurs to the historic Diederik Vineyard, before a taster of the exclusive Winegrower's Menu in the hotel's Garden Restaurant. . 
Following a breathtaking boat trip around the scenic Lake Zurich, guests are transported to the family owned Diederik Vineyard to discover the unexplored expanse of Swiss wines, including the Pinot noir Barrique, Cuvée Blanche and Rosé de Pinot Noir. After sampling the selected wines, guests are given a guided tour of the winery, steeped in history cultivated by generations gone by. Back at The Dolder Grand, guests are treated to an assortment of exclusive Swiss wines, selected by the hotel's esteemed sommelier, Didier Clauss, to accompany the Winegrower's Menu served in the cosmopolitan Garden Restaurant. A modern Swiss interpretation of light European cuisine has earned the restaurant 14 GaultMillau Points. Related articles
